author: Reuters Editorial
title: Factbox - Britain's coronavirus lockdown: What you can and can't do
description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson ramped up the nation's coronavirus measures on Monday, enforcing a nationwide lockdown after chairing an emergency Cobra committee.
content:
LONDON (Reuters) - British Prime Minister Boris Johnson ramped up the nation’s coronavirus measures on Monday, enforcing a nationwide lockdown after chairing an emergency Cobra committee.
